sentences.en: It does not concern things that huddle on the periphery of life.
sentences.cn: 哲学所关注的不是堆挤在生活表面上的事物.

sentences.en: Les kept seeing Eric and Tam in a huddle and he knew they were talking about him.
sentences.cn: 莱斯总是看到埃里克和塔姆凑在一起，他知道他们是在谈论自己。

sentences.en: Off to one side, Sticht, Macomber, Jordan, and Kreps huddled to discuss something.
sentences.cn: 史蒂希特、麦康伯、乔丹和克雷普斯走到一边，私下商量起事情。

sentences.en: She huddled under the blankets.
sentences.cn: 她盖着毯子缩成一团。

sentences.en: Survivors huddle together in makeshift tents with nowhere to go.
sentences.cn: 幸存者们一起拥挤在临时帐篷里,无处可去.

sentences.en: The boys huddle together under the rock to keep warm.
sentences.cn: 男孩们缩成一团在石头底下取暖.

sentences.en: The cold wind made the boy huddle inside his coat.
sentences.cn: 寒风使这个男孩卷缩在他的外衣里.

sentences.en: The devotees sing, sip warm drinks, play cards and huddle together.
sentences.cn: 球迷们唱着歌, 呷着热饮料 、 打扑克,挨挨挤挤,互相拥作一团.

sentences.en: The house is very small and cannot huddle all of us.
sentences.cn: 房子太小了,挤不下我们所有的人.

sentences.en: The huddle of cheap buildings at the station seemed meaner than ever before.
sentences.cn: 火车站旁那挤在一堆的蹩脚房屋,看上去比以往任何时候均更为简陋.

sentences.en: The president has been huddling with his most senior aides.
sentences.cn: 总统一直在和他的顶级高级助理们秘密地聚到一起进行商谈。

sentences.en: The snow blew against his huddled body.
sentences.cn: 雪花飘落在他蜷缩的身体上。

sentences.en: Their clothes lay in a huddle on the floor.
sentences.cn: 他们的衣服杂乱地堆在地板上.

sentences.en: There was a huddle of people around the injured man.
sentences.cn: 有杂乱的一群人围着受伤的人.

sentences.en: They like living in a huddle.
sentences.cn: 他们喜欢杂居在一起.

sentences.en: Tomchek put his arm about my shoulder and we went into a brief huddle.
sentences.cn: 托姆切克搂住我的肩,我们秘密地磋商了片刻.

sentences.en: Two men I had never met detached themselves from the huddle.
sentences.cn: 我从来未见过的两个人离开了人群.

sentences.en: We all huddle round the fire.
sentences.cn: 我们都挤在炉火周围.

sentences.en: We lay huddled together for warmth.
sentences.cn: 我们紧紧挤在一起取暖。

sentences.en: We lay there: a huddle of bodies, gasping for air.
sentences.cn: 我们横七竖八地挤作一团躺在那里，大口喘着气。

phrases.tran_cn: 凑近(某人)说悄悄话；交头接耳

trans.tran_cn: 拥挤，杂乱一团，小型私人会议
trans.tran_en: a group of people or things that are close together, but not arranged in any particular order, pattern, or system
if a group of people huddle together, they stay very close to each other, especially because they are cold or frightened

trans.tran_cn: 拥挤, 卷缩, 草率从事, 挤作一团
trans.tran_en: if a group of people huddle together, they stay very close to each other, especially because they are cold or frightened

trans.tran_cn: 挤在一起，（因寒冷或害怕）蜷缩
trans.tran_en: if a group of people huddle together, they stay very close to each other, especially because they are cold or frightened

trans.tran_cn: 使聚集，使蜷曲起来，草率地行事
trans.tran_en: If people huddle in a group, they gather together to discuss something quietly or secretly
